itemDescription: English physician, and rugby union footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Bolton (20 November 1909 – 21 September 2006) was an English physician and England International rugby player.He played five times for England making his debut against Wales in 1933. His final appearance was in 1938.He played for Wakefield and Harlequins, as well as thirty times for Yorkshire.He was son of Professor J Shaw Bolton, the medical Superintendent at the west Riding Mental Hospital in Wakefield and a pupil at QEGS Wakefield.

response: *Reg Bolton (clown), clown, teacher, actor and writer
*Reg Bolton (rugby union), English rugby union international fl. 1930s
